headline: McCormick Appoints Gavin Hattersley and Rick Dierker to Board of Directors
summary: McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE: MKC), a global leader in flavor, today announced that Gavin Hattersley, retired President and Chief Executive Officer of Molson Coors Beverage Company, and Rick Dierker, President and Chief Executive Officer of Church & Dwight Co., Inc., have been appointed to McCormick's Board of Directors effective February 1, 2026.

headline: Thursday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
summary: The Dow Industrials jumped nearly 590 points Wednesday after President Trump called off new tariffs on Europe.

headline: Brown-Forman Advances on Strong Brands and Premiumization
summary: BF.B is gaining momentum as premium and super-premium brands, innovation and emerging-market growth lift pricing power and support margins.

headline: Can B&G Foods' Margin Improvement Hold Amid Soft Demand?
summary: BGS sales dip in Q3, but steady EBITDA, cost cuts, and portfolio reshaping point to a higher-margin 2026.

headline: Hormel Foods International Sales: Still a Growth Engine?
summary: HRL's International business highlights pockets of growth, with branded products gaining traction despite ongoing regional market challenges.

headline: McCormick (MKC) To Report Earnings Tomorrow: Here Is What To Expect
summary: Food flavoring company McCormick (NYSE:MKC) will be reporting earnings this Thursday morning. Here’s what to expect.
